sense.name: the surrounding conditions or circumstances
sense.commentary:
ENVIRONMENT[+event]
Refers to the state of the current setting. The set of conditions.
sense.examples: He longed for the comfortable environment of his living room. The university environment made John insecure. We've stumbled into a very dangerous environment. Always check the surrounding environment before beginning CPR.

sense.name: a geographical area
sense.commentary: A habitat, area, or part of the earth. Frequently needs to be saved.
sense.examples: The Jones family lives in a flat, agricultural environment. Penguins have adapted to a polar environment. Does your congressional representative care about the environment?
